Package com.okta.sdk.helper

Class PolicyApiHelper<T extends Policy>

java.lang.Object
com.okta.sdk.resource.api.PolicyApi
com.okta.sdk.helper.PolicyApiHelper<T>
public class PolicyApiHelper<T extends Policy> extends PolicyApi
Helper class that enables working with sub-typed Policy references.
